senses.sense_definition: One who decorates or adds ornaments to something.

examples.text: The <w>adorner</w> carefully placed the final jewels on the royal crown.
She worked as an <w>adorner</w> of interiors, transforming plain rooms into elegant spaces.

senses.sense_definition: A visual element in a graphical user interface used to decorate or enhance another element.

examples.text: You can use a margin <w>adorner</w> to display additional options next to the text box.
The software developer created a custom <w>adorner</w> to highlight selected items on the canvas.
